original_text: In that day, saith the Lord of hosts, shall ye call every man his neighbour under the vine and under the fig tree.
korean_text: 만군의 여호와가 말하노라 그 날에 너희가 각각 포도나무와 무화과나무 아래로 서로 초대하리라 하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: In that day, saith the Lord of hosts,
shall ye call every man his neighbour
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 각각 자기 이웃을 부르게 되리라

sentences.original_text: under the vine and under the fig tree.
